content.text:
<image 1> on the right reflects an interest in

A. accurately copying figures and subject matter from nature
B. aligning the Old Testament and the New Testament through typology
C. emphasizing the role of the saints in the church
D. asserting imperial authority over the church

The image you provided is the famous icon "The Holy Trinity" by Andrei Rublev, which depicts three angels sitting around a table. This icon is often interpreted as a representation of the Christian doctrine of the Trinity.

Given this context, the correct answer to your question would be:

B. aligning the Old Testament and the New Testament through typology

This is because the icon uses the story of Abraham's hospitality to the three angels (an event described in the Old Testament) as a typological representation of the Holy Trinity (a concept central to the New Testament).
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
